title: Civilizations 1 - Sci Fi Music Pack
description: A sci-fi music pack including 10 themes (30 seamless loops in total!). For any space strategy, puzzle, or fantasy RPG game that requires ethereal, ambient, futuristic, and dark background music.
longDescription:
'Civilizations 1' has that grandiose, large-scale sound! We created 10 themes, along with a bunch of alternative edits ( 30 HQ audio files in total, all loopable). All 10 themes share similar characteristics, which is important in order to make your next sci-fi game soundtrack sound coherent, powerful, and professional. We could definitely imagine it being used during the gameplay or in the main menu of an adventure, arcade, RPG, or any kind of futuristic space-themed game! Of course, this pack is suitable for a wide variety of different uses, not necessarily tied to game development projects.


  • Each theme comes in 3 variations:

Full Theme (everything plays together), No Ornaments (Without ambient ornaments on top of the sound), and Lite Version (No Drums, No Ornaments). We suggest starting Lite Versions by using a slight 'Fade In' effect for best results.


SoundCloud Preview - All Tracks Included

* Now available in our Sci-Fi Music Bundle that saves you 50%!
technicalDetails:
Specs:

Number of Audio Wavs: 30

Number of Audio Cues: 30

Format: 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, Stereo, WAV

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 42:44

Supported Development Platforms: All



Thank You!
